decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The proposed use would result in the loss of a viable retail unit, detrimental to the vitality, viability and retail character of this major neighbourhood centre and is contrary to policies S.2.1 (Non-Retail uses in Primary frontages) of the adopted Unitary Development Plan and S.1.2 (Non-Retail uses in Primary Frontages ) of the Revised Deposit Unitary Development Plan.

Condition : 2 - The proposed use is likely to give rise to an unacceptable increase in vehicular activity and associated noise disturbance which is likely to be detrimental to the amenity of the surrounding occupiers and contrary to policies S.2.1 of the Unitary Development Plan 1996 and Policy S.1.2 of the Revised Deposit UDP.

Condition : 3 - The proposal is likely to give rise to conditions prejudicial to the free flow of traffic and general safety on the adjoining highway. The proposal is therefore contrary to policy T.2.5 (Parking and Servicing) of the Unitary Development Plan 1996 and T.1.4 of the Revised Deposit UDP.
description: Change of use from A1 (Retail) to A3 (Restaurant and hot food take away) and erection of ventilation extract duct at rear.
